mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (rev_no, rmem_no, rstore_no, rticket_no, rev_date, rev_people, rev_start, rev_end, rev_status, rev_request, rev_name, rev_phone) VALUES (SEQ_REV_NO.NEXTVAL, #{rmemNo}, #{rstoreNo}, #{rticketNo}, DEFAULT, #{revPeople}, TO_DATE(#{revStart}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), TO_DATE(#{revEnd}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'N', #{revRequest}, #{revName}, #{revPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT R.REV_NO, R.RMEM_NO, R.RSTORE_NO, R.REV_DATE, R.REV_PEOPLE, R.REV_START, R.REV_END, R.REV_STATUS, R.REV_REQUEST, R.REV_NAME, R.REV_PHONE, S.STORE_NAME, T.TICKET_NAME, T.TICKET_PRICE, T.TICKET_TIME FROM RESERVATION R LEFT JOIN STORE S ON R.RSTORE_NO = S.STORE_NO LEFT JOIN TICKET T ON R.RTICKET_NO = T.TICKET_NO WHERE R.RMEM_NO = #{memNo}

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(r.REV_PEOPLE), 0) AS RESERVED_PEOPLE FROM STORE s LEFT JOIN RESERVATION r ON s.STORE_NO = r.RSTORE_NO WHERE s.STORE_NO = #{rstoreNo} AND r.REV_STATUS = 'Y' AND ( (#{revStart} >= r.REV_START AND #{revStart} < r.REV_END) OR (#{revEnd} > r.REV_START AND #{revEnd} <= r.REV_END) OR (#{revStart} <= r.REV_START AND #{revEnd} >= r.REV_END) )
SELECT REV_NO, RMEM_NO, RSTORE_NO, REV_DATE, REV_PEOPLE, REV_START, REV_END, REV_STATUS, REV_REQUEST, REV_NAME, REV_PHONE FROM RESERVATION WHERE REV_NO = #{revNo}
